alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 3:00PM CDT until April 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN...CRAWFORD...NORTHERN SEBASTIAN AND SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles east of Van Buren, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Alma... Barling... Lavaca... Mulberry... Dyer... Winslow... Chester... Rudy... Lee Creek... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Devils Den State Park... Lake Fort Smith... Figure Five... Fern... Kibler... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 32. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 43. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
